name: Dungeons of Regarode
description:
Controls

WASD to move
Up arrow key for normal arrow attack and to interact with NPCs
Left arrow key for arrow barrage
Right arrow key for flame arrow
Down arrow key for potion (Health/Energy + 50)

---

Story

Whilst the air in Carenthia is thick with rivalry and contention, groups of selfless heroes have formed to clear out the bandit tribes and nesting monsters from the caves beneath.

These unlikely groups of brave adventurers have searched far and wide to find the dungeons containing unwanted foes. 

Will your group succeed where others have failed?

  • Assemble your team with up to 4 heroes
  • Start your legacy by choosing one of the 8 base classes
  • Define your legend by upgrading your skills
  • Rid Carenthia of enemies by clearing all 4 dungeons
